name: ChatAid: Here I go again!
detailed_description:
You never think you'll see it again.
After all, it's been two months since your conversation with Aimé.
But it's there.
The little icon that teases you.
Not on your PC, this time, but on your cell phone.
"ChatAid".

A very short sequel, with a familiar red-haired teen, and more Achievements.

short_description: A very short sequel to "ChatAid", with a familiar red-haired teen, and more Achievements.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 115 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 115 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86 or compatible
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 115 MB available space
